General.Name: Batero Gold Corp
General.Description: Batero Gold Corp., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in Colombia. The company primarily explores for gold, copper, and silver deposits. It owns a 100% interest in the Batero-Quinchia project, which consists of 1,407 hectares tenement and two applications for a concession contract of 169 hectares located in the municipality of Quinchia, Department of Risaralda, Colombia. The company was formerly known as Angus Resources Inc. and changed its name to Batero Gold Corp. in July 2010. Batero Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 2 Toronto Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 2B5
